H3.text: Which city hosted the 1980 Summer Olympics, which were boycotted by over 60 nations. Mosc√∫

A4.text: The 1980 Summer Olympics were an international multi-sport event held from 19 July to 3 August 1980 in Moscow, Soviet Union, in present-day Russia.
